judgment_text:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
O. O. C. J.
COURT RECEIVER'S REPORT NO.129 OF 2006
IN
SUIT NO.814 OF 1971
United Bank of India
..Plaintiff.
Vs.
M. G. Industries Pvt. Ltd. & Ors.
..Defendants.
...
Mr. L.N. Singh i/b M/s. Vyas & Bhalwal for the Plaintiff.
Mr. Ameet Gandhi for the auction purchaser   M/s. Steetfab
Engineering Corporation.
Mr. Umashankar Upadhye for the auction purchaser.
Mr. L.B. S. Puri, Assistant from the office of the Official Liquidator,
Mumbai present.
Mr. D.V. Deokar, 1st Assistant to Court Receiver present.
...
CORAM: DR. D.Y. CHANDRACHUD, J.
 6th October, 2006.
P.C. :
There is no question of any modification being made at
the behest of the Court Receiver after over two decades at this
stage. The Court Receiver shall strictly comply with the orders of
the Court which hold the field.
